title: What Your Online Self Reveals About You
description: Every day, we leave small traces of ourselves online. And we might not realize what these traces say about us. This week, computational social scientist Sandra Matz explores how understanding what we actually do online –  not just what we think we do – can help us improve our lives. Looking for a last-minute holiday gift for a fellow Hidden Brain fan? You can now give a gift subscription to Hidden Brain+!
author: Hidden Brain Media
excerpt: Stitcher is the easiest way to listen, download, and discover podcasts for free across iOS, Android, Web, and more. Access exclusive podcasts from your favorite hosts with Stitcher Premium.
text: We’re proud to be home to some of the best production talent around -- a team of people who make incredible podcasts for our Stitcher Studios original network.
